title: AWS Hands-on: Working with S3, EC2 and VPC
headline: Explore Amazon Web Services, including how to create a virtual private cloud (VPC), in this free online course.
description: Discover how Amazon Web Services (AWS) enables you to store and access resources by developing a virtual private cloud (VPC). Instead of using the AWS console, this course looks at a graphical interface that uses Python to accomplish this goal via point-and-click. You will learn software development fundamentals by using Boto3, a Python library. Start your journey by enrolling for free and earning optional AWS certification.

courseDescription:
The uses of Amazon Web Services (AWS) are varied and across many industries such as data and analytics, infrastructure software, migration, security, and much more. This course shows you a simple use case of securely storing objects and performing basic operations. You will learn about the tools (an integrated development environment, library, and programming language) and create an AWS account. Next, based on your operating system, you will discover how to set up your environment.

In the next section, you'll explore the fundamental concept of buckets and bucket operations, including creating and deleting a bucket. After that, you study object operations, including how to upload small and large files, read objects, make multiple copies of them and be introduced to the idea of a lifecycle policy. Following that, the instructor illustrates a particular use case, the hosting of a website.

The final section introduces you to a virtual private cloud (VPC). You will learn how to create a VPC, an Internet gateway, public and private subnet, route table, add a name tag to resources and attach the gateway to a VPC. Subsequently, you'll study the Elastic Compute Cloud Instance (EC2) and construct a security group, a startup script, launch an EC2 instance, connect to the EC2 instance, and then see how to perform basic actions like describing, modifying, stopping and starting an instance. So, get ahead by learning how to be a creator in the virtual world by taking this free online AWS course.

Start Course Now
certificateDetail:
All Alison courses are free to enrol study and complete. To successfully complete this certificate course and become an Alison Graduate, you need to achieve 80% or higher in each course assessment. Once you have completed this certificate course, you have the option to acquire an official Diploma, which is a great way to share your achievement with the world.

Your Alison certificate is:
  • Ideal for sharing with potential employers
  • Include it in your CV, professional social media profiles and job applications.
  • An indication of your commitment to continuously learn, upskill & achieve high results.
  • An incentive for you to continue empowering yourself through lifelong learning.
Alison offers 3 types of Diplomas for completed Diploma courses:
  • Digital certificate: a downloadable certificate in PDF format immediately available to you when you complete your purchase.
  • certificate: a physical version of your officially branded and security-marked certificate, posted to you with FREE shipping.
  • Framed certificate: a physical version of your officially branded and security marked certificate in a stylish frame, posted to you with FREE shipping.
Start Course Now

All certificate are available to purchase through the Alison Shop. For more information on purchasing Alison certificate, please visit our FAQs. If you decide not to purchase your Alison certificate, you can still demonstrate your achievement by sharing your Learner Record or Learner Achievement Verification, both of which are accessible from your Dashboard. For more details on our certificate pricing, please visit our Pricing Page
